title: go.talks/present: move to go.tools/cmd/present?
body:
we have two packages with present in the import path,
go.tools/present, the core present package, and where all of the docs lies, and
go.talks/present, the actual present command,

this is very confusing for users, perhaps we should move go.talks/present to
go.tools/cmd/present.
also, all required packages (except those in std. library) of go.talks/present is in
go.tools.
